description: Allows an entity to establish a way to get into the love state used for breeding.
note: This component is commonly used in conjunction with the 'minecraft:behavior.breed' component.

fields.description: If true, entities can breed while sitting
If true, the entities will blend their attributes in the offspring after they breed. For example, horses blend their health, movement, and jump_strength in their offspring.
Time in seconds before the Entity can breed again.
The list of items that can be used to get the entity into the 'love' state.
The list of entity definitions that this entity can breed with.
The entity definition of this entity's babies.
Event to run when this entity breeds.
The inclusive minimum of the variant range.
If true, the entity will become pregnant instead of spawning a baby.
Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.
The percentage chance of denying the parents' variant.
The inclusive maximum of the variant range.
The inclusive minimum of the variant range.
The list of nearby block requirements to get the entity into the 'love' state.
The block types required nearby for the entity to breed.
The number of the required block types nearby for the entity to breed.
How many blocks radius from the mob's center to search in for the required blocks. Bounded between 0 and 16.
Chance that up to 16 babies will spawn.
If true, the babies will be automatically tamed if its parents are.
The filters to run when attempting to fall in love.
Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances.
The percentage chance of denying the parents' variant.
The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's variant type.
The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's extra variant type.
If true, the entity needs to be at full health before it can breed.
If true, the entities need to be tamed first before they can breed.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Breedable
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines the way an entity can get into the 'love' state.

fields.title: Allow Sitting
fields.description: If true, entities can breed while sitting

fields.title: Blend Attributes
fields.description: If true, the entities will blend their attributes in the offspring after they breed.

fields.title: Breed Cooldown
fields.description: Time in seconds before the Entity can breed again.

fields.title: Breed Items
fields.description: The list of items that can be used to get the entity into the 'love' state. Includes 'item' for the item name, and 'result_item' that defines what item the breed item will transform to upon successful interaction (Format: itemName:auxValue).

fields.title: Breeds With
fields.description: The list of entity definitions that this entity can breed with.

subForm.description: The list of entity definitions that this entity can breed with.

fields.title: Baby Type
fields.description: The entity definition of this entity's babies.

fields.title: Breed Event
fields.description: Event to run when this entity breeds.

fields.title: Mate Type
fields.description: The entity definition of this entity's mate.

fields.title: Causes Pregnancy
fields.description: If true, the entity will become pregnant instead of spawning a baby.

fields.title: Deny Parents Variant
fields.description: Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.

subForm.description: Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.

fields.title: Chance
fields.description: The percentage chance of denying the parents' variant.

fields.title: Max Variant
fields.description: The inclusive maximum of the variant range.

fields.title: Min Variant
fields.description: The inclusive minimum of the variant range.

fields.title: Environment Requirements
fields.description: The list of nearby block requirements to get the entity into the 'love' state.

subForm.description: The list of nearby block requirements to get the entity into the 'love' state.

fields.title: Blocks
fields.description: The block types required nearby for the entity to breed.

fields.title: Count
fields.description: The number of the required block types nearby for the entity to breed.

fields.title: Radius
fields.description: How many blocks radius from the mob's center to search in for the required blocks. Bounded between 0 and 16.

fields.title: Extra Baby Chance
fields.description: Chance that up to 16 babies will spawn between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%.

fields.title: Inherit Tamed
fields.description: If true, the babies will be automatically tamed if its parents are

fields.title: Love Filters
fields.description: The filters to run when attempting to fall in love.

fields.title: Mutation Factor
fields.description: Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances. Values are between 0.0 and 1.0, with a higher number meaning more likely to mutate.

subForm.description: Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances. Values are between 0.0 and 1.0, with a higher number meaning more likely to mutate.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: The percentage chance of the offspring getting its color as if spawned rather than inheriting color from its parents.

fields.title: Extra Variant
fields.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's extra variant type.

fields.title: Variant
fields.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's variant type.

fields.title: Mutation Strategy
fields.description: Strategy used for mutating variants and extra variants for offspring. Current valid alternatives are 'random' and 'none'.

fields.title: Parent Centric Attribute Blending
fields.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] List of attributes that should benefit from parent centric attribute blending. For example, horses blend their health, movement, and jump_strength in their offspring.

fields.title: Property Inheritance
fields.description: List of Entity Properties that should be inherited from the parent entities and potentially mutated.

fields.title: Random Extra Variant Mutation Interval
fields.description: Range used to determine random extra variant.

fields.title: Random Variant Mutation Interval
fields.description: Range used to determine random variant.

fields.title: Require Full Health
fields.description: If true, the entity needs to be at full health before it can breed.

fields.title: Require Tame
fields.description: If true, the entities need to be tamed first before they can breed.
